titleStmt.title: Annotations for 劉義慶世說新語

publicationStmt.p: published electronically as part of the TLS project at https://hxwd.org

sourceDesc.p: Created by members of the TLS project

tls:text.tls:line: Zhì reminded him about the accident in the Grand Academy,
He held himself rigidly to the ritual code.
They lectured loud and long on rites and laws,
whereas Biàn Kǔn 壼 always kept himself within the bounds of propriety and law.
to sort out and establish the rites and ceremonies, laws and ordinances.

sense.def: legal injunction; order by authority of the law
(presumably) only N is a case in point, only N is like this

tls:text.tls:line: When he became grand warden of Yùzhāng,

sense.def: governor of a contextually determinate place N

tls:text.tls:line: The grand warden of Yǐngchuān (Hénán 河 南) had penalized Chén Shí 寔 by shaving his head.

sense.def: governor of a contextually determinate place N

tls:text.tls:line: You should banish him beyond the sea

sense.def: use an action (to deal with a situation)

tls:text.tls:line: his father was a cow-doctor. [[CHECK MATHER'S PAGE ON THIS.]]

sense.def: N who was sick; a sick N

launch an attack (which is not necessarily successful) against; direct attack; assault, personally attack (a person); sometimes used very generally: attack (an opponent, in any way) [The examples have to be distributed into the subcategories below.]
leave, go away; leave the scene
to come in order to V; come so as to V; come for the purpose of Ving
pay a sickness visit; come to so how (someone) is doing
cause to, get (someone) to (do something); send (someone to do somthing)
as object of transitive verb, also as pivot, and particularly as object of coverbs
to ruin (also abstract things, e.g. the legal system)
try to find, seek for; crave
state of being alive; life; survival; sometimes even: livelihood 治生 "look after one's livelihood"

seg.line: 豈荀巨伯所行邪？」賊既至，

tls:text.tls:srcline: 豈荀巨伯所行邪？」賊既至，
豈荀巨伯所行邪？」賊既至，
豈荀巨伯所行邪？」賊既至，

sense.def: act out; commit (improper or inappropriate acts)

tls:text.tls:srcline: 豈荀巨伯所行邪？」賊既至，
豈荀巨伯所行邪？」賊既至，
豈荀巨伯所行邪？」賊既至，
豈荀巨伯所行邪？」賊既至，

sense.def: arrive at one's goal; arrive at the place where the speaker is
the whole of (a state etc), a whole 一國"the whole country"
province as instituted by the Qín
what ((kind of) predicate 何人"what kind of person is he?"
person of male sex; often: adult male (suitable for military or civil service)
which (forming a relative clause modifying the noun that precedes) 陳言而不當
as the only one; as one person
remain in a place or in an office
one's friend; his friend; my friend etc.
suffer from (a disease etc.), be afflicted by
OBI 5: acute sickness; current state of sickness; also: xīn jí 心疾 "indisposition/illness of the heart/mind"; sickness 斯疾 temporary indisposition; falling sick
relegate to another place, send away; abandon, give up; disregard as unimportant

would rather; one should rather; I would rather (and not) [Note that occasionally this word does have an explicit first person pronoun, but pre-Qin usages are very few, while the usage become more common in Hanshu.]
I myself; me myself; my personality
having (something): leading along, taking along (introduces an object which the actor has or leads along during the action;
plural indicator (after personal pronouns) 我輩 we (JINSHU); 伊輩 they (SHISHUO) 我輩數人（ QYX 切韻序）

seg.line: 而入有義之國！」遂班軍而還，

tls:text.tls:srcline: 而入有義之國！」遂班軍而還，
而入有義之國！」遂班軍而還，

sense.def: go to so as to enter

tls:text.tls:srcline: 而入有義之國！」遂班軍而還，

sense.def: having the sense of what is proper; moral

tls:text.tls:srcline: 而入有義之國！」遂班軍而還，

sense.def: after direct speech: With this... Having said this... (also more generally: Thereupon, Then in the end

tls:text.tls:srcline: 而入有義之國！」遂班軍而還，
而入有義之國！」遂班軍而還，
而入有義之國！」遂班軍而還，

sense.def: and 任重而道遠"his burden is heavy and the way is far"
remain complete, remain unimpaired; kept out of harm's way, remain safe; remain unharmed
together, in cooperation with each other; together with (someone)
SHI: garden (with a fence) is for fruit and vegetables, normally used by ordinary citizens; grove
inside, in the middle of N 其中x
come to see that S; notice that S
in N there is, in N there was: TO BE MERGED WITH vt0oN1{SUBJ}.postN2{PLACE}}
classifier with the omitted numeral "yī" functioning as indefinite article
wave to (or perhaps also: splash (someone) with water); wave something
